subject: JUnit add-on for historical/statistical/trend analysis?
msgSnippet: Hi all, I m doing some research to determine what products/projects are out there to perform historical/statistical/trend analysis on JUnit results. Ideally,
messageBody:
Hi all,

I'm doing some research to determine what products/projects are out
there to perform historical/statistical/trend analysis on JUnit
results. Ideally, I'd like to be able to break down the JUnit results
that can be filtered, aggregated, and so forth for reports.

I've seen posts that promote/suggest Clover and Agitar. I've seen
several posts that inquire of free or open source solutions, but
without many answers - plus they're a year or two old. I'm still not
sure if Clover is what I'm looking for (I want to see the results for
test run success/failure/time/regressions/etc., not the coverage of
the product in terms of unit tests).

Are there any products/projects out there to perform reporting on
JUnit runs besides Agitar?

Thanks,
Kirk
